record.id: field.name="file.selection" and file.name="wizard" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: file.selection
record.file.name: wizard

detail.detail: No $L.file (use typecheck): If selected (set to true), this field initializes a typecheck table that acts as a holding table.

$L.file passed in: If selected (set to true), indicates the $L.file variable will be passed to the wizard from a previous wizard. You must initialize the variable in the Variables tab of the first wizard in the series.
Create a record: If selected (set to true), indicates the wizard will create a record. You must indicate the record type in the of type field. This becomes $L.file.
Select records: If selected (set to true), has the user select a record from a list.
